question:
Consider the following States:
I. Gujarat
II. Karnataka
III. Maharashtra
IV. Tamil Nadu.
The descending order of these States with reference to their level of Per Capita Net State Domestic Product is
explanation: According to 2011-12 data the correct order is- Maharashtra (101314 INR), Tamil Nadu 84496 (INR), Gujarat (75115 INR), Karnataka (68374 INR).
